::Striker/Prowl::

Striker growls. This was enough. First Prowl, a maximal under his command, 
orders him to get to a meeting, and then Sniper tells him he is in charge!

He stands up, walking to Prowl and Sniper. "Enough. You two return to the war 
room and sit down," he says firmly, "That's an order, Prowl," he adds as he 
sees the maximal stiffen.

Prowl sighs, looking back at the explosion. He wanted to make sure Iron 
Raptor was ok, but his commander was ordering him to return to the war room. 
He looks at Striker, an urgent look in his eyes.

Striker shruggs. "Allright, Prowl, come with me, Sniper, return to the war 
room and stay there." He says and sets off toward the exit, Prowl following 
him.
